price: “(Ndababurira) ko mutagomba kugira undi musenga utari Allah. Mu by’ukuri ndatinya ko mwazahura n’ibihano by'umunsi ubabaza.”
arabic: أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: an lā taʿbudū illā al-laha innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin alīmin
